title: (x) 3 mobile company corporate faces - Verona, Modena {Alexey}
content:
Can anybody see what typefaces the mobile network company 3 is using?

[http://www.three.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307105014/http:/www.three.com/ "http://www.three.com/")

They use a serif and a sans serif. Is the serif a condensed Melior perhaps?
author: Svempa99

comments.content: Thank you! I live in Sweden and when the 3 company was introduced they used the Verona typeface in very clean ads. Just big black text on a white background. I don't know if this was the same in other countries. It was probably the most distinctive advertising campaign I've seen with only sleek typography as the main idea. Now they have "polluted" their graphical image with a lot of colours and crowded ads.
